description: Upgrade your trading automation with professional MT4 to MT5 migration services in Dome, Growing northern suburb with market. Serving traders and professionals throughout Dome and surrounding areas, we provide expert MT4 to MT5 EA conversion that delivers measurable improvements in your automated trading performance. Our comprehensive MT4 to MT5 upgrade service leverages MT5 significant advantages including faster execution speeds for improved profitability, real tick backtesting providing exceptional accuracy for strategy validation, comprehensive multi-asset trading support perfect for diversified portfolios, and sophisticated order management features that reduce errors and improve efficiency. Located to serve the Dome community, we understand that traders need reliable, high-performance systems that execute flawlessly. Our migration process implements professional software engineering practices including clean object-oriented MQL5 architecture for code maintainability and scalability, robust error handling and recovery systems, flexible account type configuration supporting both hedge and netting modes, and thorough performance optimization specifically for MT5 modern execution engine. Every Expert Advisor undergoes extensive testing protocols that verify 98%+ signal accuracy compared to the original MT4 version, ensuring seamless transition while unlocking MT5 superior speed and capability advantages.

h2Headings: Why Upgrade Your MT4 EA to MT5 in Dome?
MT5 Platform Advantages for Modern Traders

faq.question: Will my MT4 EA work the same on MT5?
faq.answer: Yes! We guarantee 98%+ signal accuracy. Your migrated MT5 EA executes the same trading logic while benefiting from MT5 superior speed and features.

faq.question: What are MT5 main advantages?
faq.answer: MT5 offers faster execution, more accurate backtesting with real ticks, support for multiple asset classes, improved order management, and ongoing platform support.

faq.question: How long does migration take?
faq.answer: Most migrations complete within 2-4 weeks. Simple EAs may be ready in 1-2 weeks, complex systems may take 4-6 weeks.

faq.question: Do I get the full source code?
faq.answer: Yes! You receive both compiled EA file (.ex5) and full MQL5 source code (.mq5) for complete ownership.

faq.question: Can you migrate compiled .ex4 files?
faq.answer: Often yes, though we prefer source code for best results. Contact us for assessment of your specific EA.

faq.question: Does it work with hedging and netting accounts?
faq.answer: We configure your EA for your preferred account type during migration. MT5 supports both modes.

faq.question: Can you add MT5-specific features?
faq.answer: Yes! We can enhance your EA with MT5-exclusive features like calendar integration, multi-threading, or advanced position management.

faq.question: Do you provide support after delivery?
faq.answer: Yes, all migrations include 30 days of free support. We also offer ongoing maintenance plans.
